column2: Such credit card information is processed through a third-party vendor, Edgil Authentication Services (www.edgil.com). Once processed by Edgil, Edgil sends us a payment and a `token' - a 12-digit number associated with the customer, but not the credit card number that was forwarded to them. We do not store or otherwise share any such credit card information
